channel.description: Recent content in data interrogation on Craig Hutton, PhD

item.title: A Scientist's Guide to R: Step 3.0 - exploring data with elucidate
item.description: 1 TL;DR 2 Introduction 3 Installation & setup 4 interrogating data 4.1 checking for row copies() 4.2 count()-ing unique values 4.3 describe()-ing missingness & extreme values 5 descriptives 5.1 describe() a vector 5.2 grouped descriptions 5.3 describe_all() columns in a data frame 5.4 confidence intervals 6 to see, look 6.1 Anscombe’s lesson: numeric descriptions can be misleading 6.2 plot_*-ting data with elucidate 7 interacting with data representations 8 fix ’er up 9 performance evaluations 9.
